subject: HS PRO Shifter Software Support
description_text:
Hi Simsonn team,

I purchased the HS Pro Shifter the H/SQ Dual-Mode Racing Simulation Shifter
on 02/12/2025, and I received it in perfect order on 06/01/2025. My order
number is #SSN4315.

I have to say the build quality is great, the knob, gate, body, buttons and
the act of shifting have an excellent feel.

I then mounted it to my cockpit, plugged in the USB cord, and windows
recognised it with no issues, but it was stuck in sequential mode with no
way to change it.

In the manual it tells me to download the Simsonn Manager, which I did, and
I am on the latest version (2.1.2)

[image: image.png]

The problem is that the HS PRO Shifter is not detected or recognised in any
way when it should be an automatic process, and I'm stuck on the pedal page
and can't click on anything because the pedal is (obviously) disconnected
as I don't have it.

It's not even an option at the bottom.

[image: image.png]

In your support Manuals page, the HS PRO is also nowhere to be found.
https://www.simsonn.com/pages/simsonn-product-manuals

In the physical manual I got in the box, it clearly shows the shifter being
recognised and available within Simsonn Manager, but that's clearly not the
case.

So I'm writing to ask if there's an ETA for adding the HS PRO shifter in
the manager, and when will the new version be released?

Thank you,

Vinny Fonseca.

conversations.body_text: Hi Vinny Fonseca,  Please uninstall SIMSONN Manager version 2.1.2 from your computer first, then download and install SIMSONN Manager version 2.1.3 from our official website.  SIMSONN Manager 2.1.3 includes optimizations for the vibration function. Please test again using this version.  https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download
